attributes.action: Remove NEC Labour £25 charge for new Labour Members.
attributes.additional_details:
We need to stop this charge! The exact people who are likely to vote Corbyn are the same people who may not be able to afford to pay £25. 
We live in a democracy! We can not have people unable to vote simply because they can not afford too, it's 2016! 
This is yet another attempt to keep Corbyn out, please sign and share!
attributes.background:
With Labour gaining over 100k new members since the EU referendum, the majority to support Jeremy Corbyn
The NEC say Corbyn can automatically be put on the ballot paper, then introducing a charge for members joined within 6 months-another way for them to TRY and keep Corbyn out! So called democracy

rejection.details: Procedures for electing the leader of a political party are a matter for the party concerned, not the Government or Parliament.
